Plot: A comedian tries to make it as a serious actor when his reality-TV star fiancée talks him into broadcasting their wedding on her TV show.
Title: Top Five
Actors: Chris Rock, Rosario Dawson, J.B. Smoove, Gabrielle Union
tomatoConsensus: As smart, funny, and trenchant as writer-director-star Chris Rock's best standup work, Top Five is a career highlight for its creator -- and one of the comedy standouts of 2014.
